name: Finding Home (Ethano ChaChano)
description:
You play as Remi. 

A little boy who has gotten lost whilst playing with his mum. Now it's getting quite dark and you've got to find yourself home....

Or at least to your parents.

Please enjoy this game, my 2nd ever game jam

If you did enjoy, don't forget to leave a rating and a comment.

Thanks for playing <3
